title: Assassins Creed IV Black Flag GOD FILES ONLY
description:
Enclosed in this torrent is the COMPLETE 2 DVD's as released by COMPLEX.
I have run them through ISO2GOD and filtered out all the bloat and crap you don't need.
Instead of the game being the normal 15GB it is now 9.2GB for the WHOLE GAME.

If you only want the Single player game then when the download start kindly un-select the following file and folder:

482594D38F4DC874118D.data [FOLDER]and all files within
482594D38F4DC874118D [file]

That will leave you with just the single player campaign. 
Reducing the single player game to a small 6.4GB download instead of the usual 8GB.

THIS IS FOR RGH/JTAG USERS ONLY, YOU CANNOT BURN THESE FILES. MUST BE PLACED VIA FTP OR FSD FILE BROWSER/USB.


To install:

0000000000000000 ----- place the 555308C2 folder here

Restart console/rescan game location and FSD will pick up the new game.
